rows.label: qst201512_msg0002
rows.name: Now, tell me how to stop the device.

rows.label: qst201512_msg0003
rows.name:
Hahaha! Are you stupid?
Like I'd tell you that.

rows.label: qst201512_msg0004
rows.name:
Besides, the device is already
running. No one can stop it-

rows.label: qst201512_msg0005
rows.name:
Then shall I expose all of
your evil deeds to the world?

rows.label: qst201512_msg0006
rows.name: What...?

rows.label: qst201512_msg0007
rows.name:
From the black market routes
you use for illegal goods,
to your trading partners.

rows.label: qst201512_msg0008
rows.name:
And what despicable methods you
used to get what you want...

rows.label: qst201512_msg0009
rows.name: Th-That's...

rows.label: qst201512_msg0010
rows.name:
Oh, or perhaps you'd like to try
some of the Thanatitan yourself?

rows.label: qst201512_msg0011
rows.name:
If you drink it, you'll understand
its effects quite well, won't you?

rows.label: qst201512_msg0012
rows.name: S-Stop...!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0013
rows.name:
Why ever not? It's your favorite
poison, the one you made so much of.

rows.label: qst201512_msg0014
rows.name: Don't you want to try it?

rows.label: qst201512_msg0015
rows.name: Stop! Help!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0016
rows.name: How do you stop the machine?

rows.label: qst201512_msg0018
rows.name:
Then shall I make you
drink it all in one go?

rows.label: qst201512_msg0019
rows.name:
...The switches on the device...
press them in the order of blue,
white, blue to stop it!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0020
rows.name: ...Blue, white, blue, you say?

rows.label: qst201512_msg0021
rows.name:
Y-Yes, that's right. Is that
enough? I told you, so save me!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0022
rows.name:
Listen well. If you're lying,
your punishment is 1,000 lashes.

rows.label: qst201512_msg0023
rows.name: Hiiiieeee!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0027
rows.name:
Scary... Azami has a
terrifying personality.

rows.label: qst201512_msg0028
rows.name:
S-Scary, mo... Azami's smile
is like a demon's, mo...

rows.label: qst201512_msg0029
rows.name: Tora will never anger Azami, mo!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0031
rows.name:
Now that we know how to
stop it, let's hurry.

rows.label: qst201512_msg0032
rows.name: Right!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0033
rows.name: Yes, mo!
